AI Description: The Process Management Interface (PMIx) is an abstract interface for managing the data and resources associated with managing parallel processes. It provides a framework and services for coordinating data exchange and interaction amongst parallel processes in high-performance computing environments.
Core Features:
1. Process management and coordination
2. Data exchange amongst parallel processes
3. Resource management
4. Scalability and performance optimization
General Tags: Process Management, Parallel Computing, High-Performance Computing, Data Exchange, Resource Management, Scalability
